metadata.title: RHSA-2020:4134: CloudForms 5.0.8 security, bug fix and enhancement update (Moderate)
metadata.description:
Red Hat CloudForms Management Engine delivers the insight, control, and automation needed to address the challenges of managing virtual environments. CloudForms Management Engine is built on Ruby on Rails, a model-view-controller (MVC) framework for web application development. Action Pack implements the controller and the view components.

Security Fix(es):

* cfme-gemset: CloudForms: Cross Site Request Forgery in API notifications (CVE-2020-14369)

For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, acknowledgments, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.

Additional Changes:

This update fixes various bugs and adds enhancements. Documentation for these changes is available from the Release Notes document linked to in the References section.

bugzilla.text: CVE-2020-14369 CloudForms: Cross Site Request Forgery in API notifications

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 8 is installed
cfme-gemset is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
